Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the shooter was identified as Abu Al-Hom Kreuzi, when in reality, the suspect was identified as David Long.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the identification of the shooter as Abu Al-Hom Kreuzi.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the identification of the shooter as Abu Al-Hom Kreuzi is accurate, despite it being a baseless rumor spread by internet trolls.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the identification of the shooter as Abu Al-Hom Kreuzi was a result of misinformation and fear-mongering.
